info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 30849
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;filigrane.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 30849
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;filigrane.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
filigrane.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	SOA	dns1.alwaysdata.com. hostmaster.alwaysdata.com. 1739440033 3600 900 1209600 300

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 1463
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.filigrane.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 1463
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.filigrane.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
_dmarc.filigrane.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=DMARC1; p=quarantine; rua=mailto:dmarc@filigrane.beta.gouv.fr!10m; ruf=mailto:dmarc@filigrane.beta.gouv.fr!10m; rf=afrf; pct=100; ri=86400"

info.name: SPF Record - Detection
author: rxerium

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:

response:

;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;filigrane.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
filigrane.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=iQX_r6ZSWsiR2oL04_MLF9cnlOT4IepZkfjCpvbnuA4"
filigrane.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 mx include:_spf.alwaysdata.com include:helpscoutemail.com ~all"

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 9884
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;filigrane.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
filigrane.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=iQX_r6ZSWsiR2oL04_MLF9cnlOT4IepZkfjCpvbnuA4"
filigrane.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 mx include:_spf.alwaysdata.com include:helpscoutemail.com ~all"

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 48324

;filigrane.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;filigrane.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
filigrane.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns2.alwaysdata.com.
filigrane.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns1.alwaysdata.com.

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: filigrane.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 405 Not Allowed Connection: close Content-Length: 150 Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Date: Sun, 11 May 2025 04:40:49 GMT Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 X-Request-Id: d76fbdf9-13c2-4895-805a-1d282ce7f3f5 405 Not Allowed

405 Not Allowed

nginx
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: filigrane.beta.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://filigrane.beta.gouv.fr/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
